GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.26 to before v5.15.19
GSD.description:
net: fix information leakage in /proc/net/ptype

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.19 by commit e43669c77cb3a742b7d84ecdc7c68c4167a7709b, it was introduced in version v2.6.26 by commit 2feb27dbe00cbb4f7d31f90acf6bd0d751dd0a50. For more details please see the references link.
